remarks: The cyclic subgroup generated by ` A ` is a cyclic group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cycsubgcyg2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubgcyg2.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
cycsubgcyg2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. B ) -> ( G |`s ( K ` { A } ) ) e. CycGrp ) $.
